replies.msg:
Google左幾個鐘
唔知點解只係install一個dependency 都可以出倒咁多error。。。。
請問邊個位出錯？
1. npm init @a new folder
2.edit the json to include dependency name
3.npm install
....
The package is broken, download出404應該冇得搞

[/Volumes/RAMDisk]$ mkdir lihkg
[/Volumes/RAMDisk]$ cd lihkg/
[/Volumes/RAMDisk/lihkg]$ npm i osc

> serialport@6.2.2 install /Volumes/RAMDisk/lihkg/node_modules/serialport
> prebuild-install || node-gyp rebuild

npm WARN saveError ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/Volumes/RAMDisk/lihkg/package.json'
npm notice created a lockfile as package-lock.json. You should commit this file.
npm WARN enoent ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/Volumes/RAMDisk/lihkg/package.json'

npm WARN lihkg No repository field.
npm WARN lihkg No README data
npm WARN lihkg No license field.

+ osc@2.2.4
added 205 packages from 83 contributors in 13.456s

replies.msg:
npm i osc@2.2.0

都得喎

似係你個package要用python 2
你係python3

自己睇, osc用serialport v6.2.2用python2
https://github.com/node-serialport/node-serialport/tree/v6.2.2#installation-instructions

replies.msg:
npm既野唔一定純javascript
可以有C, 有python, Lua, bash script etc etc
因為package.json個script部份，可以自定義行咩command都得
感謝：）我最後搵過第個package只行js得左：）

1個print.js + npm i osc-min
得左
https://github.com/toddtreece/osc-examples

quote.msg:

你係python3

replies.msg:
npm只係一個package manager，啲packages唔一定要用node.js行
node.js只係一個JavaScript runtime，用node.js唔一定要用npm
可能因為裝node.js包埋npm
所以多數人都會夾埋一齊用
但係其實兩樣嘢冇直接關係，亦都唔係必然
